short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on any emoji to copy it instantly. Now paste it anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pin the extension icon on the browser toolbar. Click on this icon, and look for your desired emoji. Now, click on that emoji, and it would be automatically copied to your clipboard. Now, you can paste it anywhere.
Visit our home page for more information: https://browsernative.com/emoji-copy-and-paste-extension/

Based on the `emoji-picker-element` project by Nolan Lawson. Extension by BrowserNative.
